bridge-type.label: KM200/100/50
bridge-type.description: The KM200 binding is communicating with a Buderus Logamatic web KM200 / KM100 / KM50. It is possible to receive and send parameters like string or float values.

parameter.name: ip4Address
parameter.label: IP4 Address
parameter.description: IP4 Address of the KMXXX device

parameter.name: privateKey
parameter.label: Private Key
parameter.description: Private en-/decryption key built from MD5Salt, GatewayPassword and PrivatePassword

parameter.name: readDelay
parameter.label: Read Delay
parameter.description: Delay between two read attempts in ms

parameter.name: maxNbrRepeats
parameter.label: Maximum Number of Repeats
parameter.description: Maximum number of repeats in case of a communication error (like HTTP 500 error)
